name: Lightseeker (cardvark61)
description:
A very short Metroid Vania that revolves around darkness, brightness, and the rivalry between them.  CAUTION: The game contains flashing lights

Controls:

Arrow keys to walk

Z to jump

X to attack

Flashing orbs are power-ups

-The plus sign gives you an extra jump

-The arrow increases your jump strength

-The clock increases your attack speed

-The blast increases your strength
